title: What are some OP combos your main has with other champions
body:
Mine is {{champion:83}} and his OP interaction is with {{champion:26}}.

When {{champion:83}}  has his minions out {{champion:26}} throws his time bombs on them and {{champion:83}}  will E the minions and they will jump towards enemy champions with the E and chase them down.  If the champion kills the minion the bomb explodes easy, If they don't kill the minion the bomb will explode even easier.




When {{champion:83}} uses his W{{champion:91}} can E over it for an easy speed boost



When {{champion:34}}  and {{champion:83}}  are level 6 and {{champion:34}} a uses her W, {{champion:83}}  can use his W and trap someone inside really easily


When {{champion:83}}  uses W, {{champion:67}} can E someone on the wall of his W


When {{champion:83}}  uses W, {{champion:78}}  can use her E and stun someone on the wall


How about you?

what are some of your main's OP combos



EDIT: 

HOLY CRAP  I didn't expect this to get this popular.

also have more fun now that I asked you to please. :P

2nd EDIT:

the 100 person mark has been passed for comments :D

replies.body:
{{champion:14}} {{champion:90}} : Aids cannon 
{{champion:14}} {{champion:18}} : Bomb cannon - let Trist slap her bomb on a minion and build up 4 stacks, then shoot the minion at the enemy right before it goes off.
{{champion:14}} {{champion:26}} : Bomb cannon
{{champion:14}} {{champion:15}} : Shoot the minion Sivir is targeting with her Ricochet so that the attack will bounce straight to enemy champions. Easy poke.
{{champion:14}} {{champion:429}} : Triple knock-ups for the win!
{{champion:14}} {{champion:13}} : Surprise Sion ult in the middle of your team! Hard to get the timing perfect, though.

{{champion:34}} + {{champion:223}}  is super fun. He eats you when you're in egg, and then spits you out in a safer place. 

{{champion:34}} + {{champion:44}} {{champion:10}} work as well, because of their ults.

{{champion:34}} + {{champion:78}} {{champion:67}} . Put a wall behind them for a free stun :D

{{champion:202}} + {{champion:223}} or
{{champion:161}}  + {{champion:223}} ...Why can't he eat them as they fire their ults? 
I WANT A LAZOR/GUNNER TURRET MOVING TOWARDS MY ENEMIES!

######P.s. I know its because they are rooted during their ults.

{{champion:98}} {{champion:420}} Shenpai Hentai
{{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} Goon squad.
seriously, where's rengar in all that :P
What's the point of ulting to Rengar if he kills his target instantly?

{{champion:5}} JG

{{champion:21}} ADC

Xin gets you fed early and Blitz helps with roams and skirmishes. Malphite knocks up while MF and Yas ult and their entire team is done.

This is the reason people hate Yasuo tho, but in solo que, no one is useful.

Now is the enemy getting knocked up or is it mf?

{{champion:53}} + {{champion:427}} Forget your first death, you're never going to reach your lane to begin with. Also, your jungler will disconnect approximately 4 seconds after jungle camps spawn.

{{champion:24}} with{{item:3078}} {{item:3153}} {{item:1416}} {{item:3124}}  + {{champion:67}} : And you thought building tank would help you...

{{champion:24}} + Literally anything : Jax *is* **fucking busted**. I main him. How to engage: W, E, Q. In fight: Spam W and E (Maybe time E depending who you're fighting) and how to disengage: R if in trouble, E, E, Ward Hop.
{{champion:24}} {{champion:24}}  I do not need combos
you mean stunned XD
You've mixed it up, they can't say no if they are stunned, but they can't run if they are snared. (Let's be real, is hentai consensual?)
Wouldn't also {{champion:83}} W be able to combo well with {{champion:48}} pillar? (irrelevant order)

it's an amazing CC combo for sure.

Flash is your greatest enemy here in this situation though >.<

{{champion:122}} and {{champion:157}} :
He can ult off my E, and during his ult I can freely use my q on the enemies without them dodging.
{{champion:122}} and {{champion:86}} :
Garen presses R for 1.5k true dmg (Villain), Darius presses his R for 1k true dmg. Dead tank.
{{champion:122}} and {{champion:51}} :
Pull enemy into trap, cait sets another trap while they're knocked up by my pull. ez kills
{{champion:122}} and {{champion:45}} :
Pull them into Event Horizon, both of our R can easily deal upwards of 2.5k+ damage
{{champion:122}} and {{champion:202}}:
Pull them into a lotus trap, then jhin uses his w on the marked target to snare them.
Curtain Call 60% slow on shots+ Crippling strike 90% slow= gg ez
{{champion:122}} and {{champion:16}}:
I buy spirit visage and become unkillable, I can pull them into equinox to silence+snare
{{champion:122}} and {{champion:222}}:
Pull enemy into chompers+ My decimate and her Mega death rocket= double kll

{{champion:72}} {{champion:90}} for the double suppress

Who am I kidding I play soloQ we just ult at the same time instead

{{champion:103}} + {{champion:429}} has got to be the most fun I've ever had. Toss an assassin in, kill your target, get out and still have a free charm left.
{{champion:99}} + {{champion:119}} BLOOOOOD BATHHHH
{{champion:103}} + {{champion:44}} Easy stuns as she can just reposition for Taric.
{{champion:103}} + {{champion:61}} When you give a mobile champion even more mobility and a way to clump everyone together for easier Qs

To me, it seems like every champion with a "partner" ability of sorts really does well with Ahri, maybe cause of her dashes?

{{champion:3}} -

Enemy {{champion:63}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:17}} deathfire's grasp or other damage over time effects + Galio W: "Wait, are you  trying to damage me?"

{{champion:61}} E + ult or {{champion:122}} ax hook thing + Galio ult: "No escaping. Accept your fate"

{{champion:27}} Q or {{champion:120}}  + Galio E: "Yes, keep running"
Also: {{champion:55}}   Galio starts his ult, Kat blinks to him and starts spinning.
{{champion:89}} {{champion:236}} : We touch the butt of the ADC at level 2, and they cannot say no when they are stunned.

{{champion:45}} {{champion:67}} Can E with my E, though they never do :l
I always love some {{champion:37}} {{champion:21}} level 6 cheese
{{champion:25}} {{champion:202}} is the snare lane
{{champion:22}} {{champion:201}} The slow lane
{{champion:99}} {{champion:51}} This one I really love. You get them low, which is not hard to do at all. At level 6 Cait ults the low enemy, and either gets a free kill or the other bot lane participant will move to block it. Lux ults the line where Cait's bullet is; now that they're both low, you get the double kill. Her Q lets Cait put a trap underneath. Super long range lane and it's really fun. 

Obviously not all my "mains" but I play a variety of champions

{{champion:22}} {{champion:41}} Ashe ult into Cannon Barrage for rather obvious reasons.
{{champion:8}} {{champion:41}} Haemoplague's damage amp + Gangplanks combo = a lot of damage.
{{champion:12}} {{champion:41}} Alistar's little combo is basically a free Keg hit :P
{{champion:202}} {{champion:41}} Curtain Call + Cannon Barrage.

{{champion:62}} {{champion:223}}: Wukong Ults, Tahm Eats him. Staff spins through Tahms stomach .-.

{{champion:62}} {{champion:9}}: Death field

{{champion:62}} {{champion:13}}: Sup**Ryze**-kong

{{champion:62}} {{champion:103}}: Ahri charms while Wukong Dashes to the charmed target, followed by Wukong and Ahri Ulting

{{champion:62}} {{champion:20}}: Icy Spin to Win

{{champion:62}} {{champion:157}}: I call it shame T_T
Hello fellow Yorick main, I am Yorick main also, and these things are true. Also try Yorick and Sion, it is funny.
I'll have to try it. I can only imagine the {{champion:83}} W to {{champion:14}} Q combos or something close to that XD

My main is {{champion:112}} .

You can just imagine how cancerous a guaranteed stun circle is. I'm talking about {{champion:45}} +{{champion:112}} . I encountered this more than once in ARAM before.

{{champion:25}} + {{champion:202}} = very easy lockdown kills bot. Same goes for {{champion:25}} + {{champion:222}} 

Also {{champion:25}} + {{champion:51}} works wonders.

Lets see.

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:29}} Try killing the "assassin" ulting your team now.

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:421}} Super easy knockups for Rek.

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:59}} Locked into one space then AOE stun.

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:33}} Stupid armour, stupid shields, stupid heals, stupid return damage.

{{champion:44}} + Any Assassin, because who said assassins couldn't have hard cc, shields, heals, and invulnerability?

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:154}} You cast stun as he flies in.  Even more AOE cc to avoid.

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:8}} This will never die and you can't escape the stun if Vlad pools during it.

{{champion:44}} + {{champion:81}} Now before the jokes, you have poke, hard engage, cc for his ult, and he can line up stuns with his E.  Everything a lane needs.  The real reason this is OP though is because games are about having fun, and no one has more fun than an Ezreal and Taric together ;P
Don't have any, but just noting that any fan of yorick is okay in my book.

http://m.imgur.com/7UGQ05w?r

First thing that came to mind.
